attributes.action: Implement the decision to leave EU & resist attempts to sabotage this process
attributes.additional_details: Concern regarding e-petitions and demonstrations by individuals to derail the democratic choice of the people of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Uphold the decision of the people in their majority as voted in the referendum 23rd June 2016. To protect the sovereign democracy of the people of the UK, their voice, their decision & to act upon their direction as enshrined in parliamentary law. Any change would be undemocratic and illegal.
